Package sortpom.wrapper.operation

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    WrapperFactory
    Creates wrappers around xml fragments.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DetachOperation
    Xml hierarchy operation that detaches a xml child from its parent.
    GetContentStructureOperation
    Xml hierarchy operation that returns xml content from wrappers.
    HierarchyWrapper
    Aggregates a number of wrappers, so that they can be treated as a recursive hierarchy.
    HierarchyWrapperOperation
    This class gives a default implementation of an operation that traverse the xml hierarchy.
    SortAttributesOperation
    Xml hierarchy operation that sort all attributes of xml elements.
    SortChildrenOperation
    Xml hierarchy operation that all xml elements.
    ToStringOperation
    Xml hierarchy operation that returns xml content as readable text.
